title: Introducing: Polar Dear
content:
Oleg Borsos and Mark Lechner are Polar Dear, a self proclaimed ‘eurodance’ duo from Budapest, however don’t let that unbecoming tag put you off, as they are far more than your stereotypical eurotrash Cheeky Girls.

Debut track Even If I’m Late is a stomping Bloc Party-esque number; danceable and insanely catchy, probably how Kele intended his solo album to turn out to be honest. The video to accompany Even If I’m Late is a gorgeously shot affair, drenched in relaxing light blues and distorted imagery. Oh, and a rather attractive young woman. Synth heavy and vocal driven, Even If I’m Late is an ‘everyone to the dancefloor’ track in waiting, and an extremely promising snapshot of what is to come from Polar Dear.

Check out the video below, and head over to Polar Dear’s bandcamp for a free download of Even If I’m Late.
